page.title: 04Pugneys development
page.content: To the South West of Wakefield and the {River Calder}is an area known as { {Pugneys.}It is not far from Junction 39 of the M1 Motorway. A new road hs been built to link Denby Dale Road with the Wakefield to Barnsley Road. Called Asdale Road it allows access to the Pugneys area and to the Asda Hypermarket from which it gets its name. Unfortunately it cuts right across {Broadlands Farm}which is owned by Mr. Thompson the farmer. This part of the area had been an open cast coal site, but when the coal had been removed the N.C.B. were asked to see that the area was landscaped. It has now been made into two lakes, a large one and a small one. In the future Wakefield Council is to (cont. on page 2)
